about_the_game:
Testament of Power invites players to embrace the role of a tribal member on the culturally rich island of Ambali. Here, power is earned through time-honored traditions, requiring players to undergo initiation trials and challenge creatures native to the island's diverse biomes. By collecting trophies from these powerful beasts, players enhance their attributes and gain unique abilities, reflecting the island's ancient customs and allowing for a flexible and deeply customizable playstyle.

The game features biomes with escalating challenges, where players can battle increasingly difficult creatures and eventually confront Biome Alphas in cooperative gameplay, rewarding them with a rare and powerful trophy. With an emphasis on character building via trophy collection and raid combat, "Testament of Power" offers a unique and immersive experience in a richly detailed world.

Explore on Ambali

The island Ambali is divided into distinct biomes, each showcasing unique elemental wildlife and fauna. Every biome presents its own set of challenges and requires a different strategy to navigate and reach its central core. Adapt your approach to conquer the varying landscapes and uncover the secrets that lie within each biome.

All about Trophies

In "Testament of Power," character progression deviates from traditional RPG mechanics. Instead of leveling up through experience points, players enhance their characters by hunting for trophies. Each trophy not only boosts your attributes but also grants you new abilities. Every creature you encounter possesses a unique set of abilities that can become yours if you claim their trophy and successfully absorb their spiritual mojo through a traditional ritual.

This trophy system allows for complete flexibility in your playstyle, enabling you to tailor your abilities based on the trophies you've earned. Your journey and your power are defined by the creatures you conquer and the trophies you collect.

Conquer the Biomes for the Symbol of Dominance

At the heart of each biome lies the energy core, a sacred artifact fiercely guarded by a powerful beast known as the biome alpha. To challenge this alpha, players must partake in a specific ritual called Madilka. This prepared event reflects the natural cycle of replacing the old alpha with a new, younger one. During this event, players have the opportunity to defeat the reigning alpha beast and earn the rare and powerful trophy - the Symbol of Dominance.

This special trophy is a crucial component for a legendary trophy ritual that culminates in obtaining the "Testament of Power" trophy.
